DOC.brief_title: Maintenance Multivitamin Supplements After Sleeve Gastrectomy
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective randomized study patient undergo laparoscopic sleeve gastrectomy perform . Patients randomize 2 group : patient receive multivitamin supplement ( Multicentrum , Pfizer , 1 tablet/day ) 3 month ( Group 1 ) , receive supplement 12 month ( Group 2 ) . Laboratory data record : vitamin ( D , B12 folic acid ) oligoelements ( calcium , iron , phosphorus , magnesium zinc ) 3 , 6 12 month surgery .
